input.sentences: i visited an old abandoned town nearby .
the main street was completely empty .
the church was beginning to fade .
only a few houses were occupied .
output.sentences: While visiting on vacation, we decided to take in some of the local historical sites.
There were markers everywhere telling us all about the history of the town.
We went to the old main street that had many of the old buildings still standing.
We visited the local church that was built when the town was first founded. It was over 100 years old.
Then we went to see the house that our great great grandparents built.
